NoticeData.Contents: [ Added 'Summon' Function ] Added 'Summon' menu in the workshop Through the Summon function, equipment recipes for crafting will be randomly determined, allowing you to obtain equipment. Equipment can be acquired immediately without any waiting period. Able to Summon various grades of Beast Aura. [ Added Aura equipment ] Added additional slot with equipment subtype as Aura Only equipment created through the Summon function can be worn in the Aura equipment slot. Aura equipment adds effects to your avatar. For more details, please refer to the following link: [https://bit.ly/9CUpdate_Intro_to_Aura](https://bit.ly/9CUpdate_Intro_to_Aura) [ Monster Collection Improvement ] We will provide a notification when the Monster Collection rewards have been changed. You can choose to adhere to the new reward policy or maintain the existing one after confirming the changes in the reward policy. If you switch to the new reward policy, it will reset aspects of your contract, including termination and reward collection timing. For more details, please refer to the following link: https://github.com/planetarium/NCIPs/blob/e105d87f152c42fcc6958aa4f545e131d7deb04a/NCIP/ncip-17.md

[Improvement] Improvement of the Equipment Item Upgrade Method Each Equipment Item has an initial experience based on its grade and crafting cost. Reinforcing the same kind of items with materials increases the experience value. If the experience value is higher than the value for a particular level, it becomes that level. Items of the same class and type have the same experience required to raise the level. As the level goes up, the stat number that increases is the same as before. Upgrades beyond level 4 consume the same NCG regardless of grade. Existing reinforced items are calculated to have the required experience to achieve the same level of reinforcement. We will explain the details through the community soon. Equipment Item Craft UI improvement Move to the top of the equipment category tab position Show in the list of items where the recipe does not exist X Add a condition to display the recipe and change the order of display according to the condition [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where the opponent's rune level was treated the same as my rune level when fighting an opponent wearing a rune in Arena Battle
[Bugfix] - Fix a bug where Crystal type was incorrectly defined in Monster Collection's reward. - This bug is a fix for a future bug that has not yet been reproduced in a claim on the mainnet.
[Bugfix] - Fixed an issue where monster collection reward quantity was calculated incorrectly.

[Improvement] - Change NCG Staking - Monster Collection - rewards - Change the AP potions and hourglasses compensation of levels 5, 6, and 7 to higher than before. Add crystals to the regular rewards you get each week at levels 2,3,4,5,6,7. - There is an update in the Monster Collection section of Launcher and 9c player.We will introduce the detailed information through medium. - Adding a loading progress bar UI.
